results.definition: a formal recommendation by a former employer to a potential future employer describing the person's qualifications and dependability
examples: requests for character references are all too often answered evasively

results.definition: a publication (or a passage from a publication) that is referred to
examples: he carried an armful of references back to his desk

results.definition: the act of referring or consulting
examples: reference to an encyclopedia produced the answer

results.definition: a short note recognizing a source of information or of a quoted passage
the most direct or specific meaning of a word or expression; the class of objects that an expression refers to
a remark that calls attention to something or someone
examples: the speaker made several references to his wife

results.definition: (computer science) the code that identifies where a piece of information is stored
a book to which you can refer for authoritative facts
examples: he contributed articles to the basic reference work on that topic

results.definition: an indicator that orients you generally
examples: it is used as a reference for comparing the heating and the electrical energy involved

results.definition: the relation between a word or phrase and the object or idea it refers to
examples: he argued that reference is a consequence of conditioned reflexes
